com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync

Class PVEData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync.PVEData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStore

    public class PVEData
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataStore
    Data collector that records all PVE statistics on the server for a specific player.
    Author:
    bitWolfy

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PVEData.DetailedPVEEntry
      Represents an entry in the Detailed data store.
      class  PVEData.TotalPVEEntry
      Represents an entry in the PVE data store.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync.DataStore

        DataStore.DetailedData, DataStore.NormalData

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PVEData(int playerId)
      Default constructor
      Creates an empty data store to save the statistics until database synchronization.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void creatureKilledPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Creature killer, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weapon)
      Registers the player death in the data store
      void dump()
      Clears the data store of all locally stored data.
      java.util.List<DataStore.DetailedData> getDetailedData()
      Returns the static entries in the data store.
      java.util.List<DataStore.NormalData> getNormalData()
      Returns the dynamic entries in the data store.
      Asynchronous method; changes to the returned List will not affect the data store.
      PVEData.TotalPVEEntry getNormalData(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weapon)
      Returns a specific entry from the data store.
      If an entry does not exist, it will be created.
      void playerKilledCreature(org.bukkit.entity.Creature victim, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weapon)
      Registers the creature death in the data store
      void sync()
      Synchronizes the data from the data store to the database, then removes it from local storage
      If an entry was not synchronized, it will not be removed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public void sync()
        Description copied from interface: DataStore

      • getNormalData

        public PVEData.TotalPVEEntry getNormalData(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type,
                                  org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weapon)
        Returns a specific entry from the data store.
        If an entry does not exist, it will be created.
        Parameters:
        type - Entity type of the creature
        weapon - Weapon used in the event
        Returns:
        Corresponding entry
